content: Defeating this particular foe will allow you to absorb the Crow Diviner Spirit (and another green Wisp nearby), but he won't be the only one you'll face in this area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating this particular foe will allow you to absorb the Crow Diviner Spirit (and another green Wisp nearby), but he won't be the only one you'll face in this area.
